title: Self-Care (PLEASE) Exercises
introText: Take your time with these calming exercises to build emotional awareness and expand your ability to identify and name feelings with kindness toward yourself.

exercises.title: Self-Care (PLEASE) Plan
exercises.description: Rate your current self-care quality (1-10) for each PLEASE element, explore suggested practices, and create your personalized self-care plan with your own ideas and challenges.

exercises.title: Self-Care (PLEASE) Reflection
exercises.description: Journal-style check-in to reflect on your progress with each self-care element, capture insights about what you've learned, and revise your plan for continued growth.
